title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, I don't hear any sound.
EB: I hear a Windows 'ding' sound (the bell sound that indicates something wrong) when I choose SWT.MULTI.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
- Open the SWT example ControlExample.
- Go to the Text tab.
- Click on StylesSWT.SINGLE.
- Then, click on StylesSWT.MULTI.
